languages.text: Тела скорчены в судорогах, выдающих причину гибели — невыносимый, адский холод.

traits.locale_text: [draft] Эти люди умерли из-за адского холода

languages.text: The contorted bodies look like they suffered from violent spasms, indicating that the vicious, unbearable cold was the cause of death.
languages.original_text: Тела скорчены в судорогах, выдающих причину гибели — невыносимый, адский холод.

traits.locale_text: The contorted bodies look like they suffered from violent spasms, which suggests that the cause of death was vicious, unbearable cold.
The contorted bodies look like they suffered from violent spasms, which suggests that the cause of death was vicious, unbearable cold.
The contorted bodies look like they suffered from violent spasms, indicative of the vicious, unbearable cold as the cause of their deaths.
The contorted bodies look like they suffered from violent spasms, indicative of the vicious, unbearable cold as the cause of their deaths.
The contorted bodies look like they suffered from violent spasms, indicating that the vicious, unbearable cold was the cause of death.
The contorted bodies look like they suffered from violent spasms, indicating that the vicious, unbearable cold was the cause of death.

languages.text: 所有的尸体都扭曲着，看起来像是临死前遭受了剧烈痉挛。这表明，他们或许是在难以忍受的严寒中冻死了。
languages.original_text: The contorted bodies look like they suffered from violent spasms, indicating that the vicious, unbearable cold was the cause of death.

traits.locale_text: 所有的尸体都扭曲着，看起来像是临死前遭受了剧烈痉挛。这表明，他们或许是在难以忍受的严寒中冻死了。

languages.text: Die verzerrten Leichen sehen aus, als hätten sie brutale Krämpfe erlebt. Das lässt vermuten, dass die gnadenlose, unerträgliche Kälte die Ursache ihres Todes war.
languages.original_text: The contorted bodies look like they suffered from violent spasms, indicating that the vicious, unbearable cold was the cause of death.

traits.locale_text: Die verzerrten Leichen sehen aus, als hätten sie brutale Krämpfe erlebt. Das lässt vermuten, dass die gnadenlose, unerträgliche Kälte die Ursache ihres Todes war.

languages.text: Los cuerpos contorsionados parecen haber sufrido violentos espasmos que evidencian un frío brutal e insoportable como causa probable de la muerte.
languages.original_text: The contorted bodies look like they suffered from violent spasms, indicating that the vicious, unbearable cold was the cause of death.

traits.locale_text: Los cuerpos contorsionados parecen haber sufrido violentos espasmos que evidencian un frío brutal e insoportable como causa probable de la muerte.

languages.text: Les cadavres crispés semblent avoir souffert de violents spasmes, ce qui indique que leur mort est due au froid, terrible et insoutenable.
languages.original_text: The contorted bodies look like they suffered from violent spasms, indicating that the vicious, unbearable cold was the cause of death.

traits.locale_text: Les cadavres crispés semblent avoir souffert de violents spasmes, ce qui indique que leur mort est due au froid, terrible et insoutenable.

languages.text: 歪んだ死体は激しい痙攣に苦しんでいるように見え、その死因が悪質で耐え難い寒さであることを物語っている。
languages.original_text: The contorted bodies look like they suffered from violent spasms, indicating that the vicious, unbearable cold was the cause of death.

traits.locale_text: 歪んだ死体は激しい痙攣に苦しんでいるように見え、その死因が悪質で耐え難い寒さであることを物語っている。

languages.text: Eğri büğrü bedenlerin şiddetli kasılmalarla sarsılmış gibi durması, dayanılmayacak derecedeki acımasız soğuğun ölüm nedeni olduğunu işaret ediyor.
languages.original_text: The contorted bodies look like they suffered from violent spasms, indicating that the vicious, unbearable cold was the cause of death.

traits.locale_text: Eğri büğrü bedenlerin şiddetli kasılmalarla sarsılmış gibi durması, dayanılmayacak derecedeki acımasız soğuğun ölüm nedeni olduğuna işaret ediyor.
